artist: Artist: China Martens; Publisher: Atomic Book Company Baltimore, Md.
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Perfect bound volume, xerographic-like illustration of a mother and daughter's embrace, in black silhouette on a magenta ground, with white text along the bottom; 238 pp.
medium: Color and black-and-white offset lithography, letterpress; bound volume
title: The Future Generation: The Zine-Book for Subculture Parents, Kids, Friends & Others
